zh_CN: 我一直都很想养宠物，但我要是把一些猫猫狗狗带回家的话，爸爸一定会骂死我的！(×_×)
en: I’ve always wanted to have a pet, but if I brought a cat or a dog home, my dad would definitely scold me to death! (×_×)

zh_CN: 不过，这里已经没有他了。但很可惜，我也没看到有什么小猫小狗。
en: But, he’s not here anymore. Sadly, I also haven’t seen any kittens or puppies around.
